name: Ice & Fire (VR)
description:
90% of code and 3D models are created in the last 3 days by myself.
10% I used Unity ProBuilder to shape out level, Oculus Interaction Kit, and Outline Asset from Unity Store.

Game created in Unity (C#) and is playable on Oculus Quest (1/2) device only. Tested and played only on Quest2 device.
